title: FPS change
body: Im sick and tired of having my FPS drop every game itâ€™s been like this ever since the last couple of weeks I went from 40+ to 1 please help me

replies.body: I wonder if you might have missed a graphics driver update after the recent patch. Test for that by updating your drivers, and go ahead and run through the other steps listed in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some basic troubleshooting. It might be worth it to go ahead and run a quick repair to make sure the game files were updated properly too.

This has been a non stop issue for the past two years. It gets better, worse, or unchanged every patch. I haven't seen the get better slope in so long that I didn't bother playing ranked this year.   I considered it may have been my 6 yr old q6600 with a 980gtx with some windows 10 on a ssd with various issues thrown in. That was until 30 min ago when my just finished being built ryzen 7 1800x with nvme drive with the windows 10 1607, 32 gigs of ram and a 1080 ti ftw3 that just blew through benchmarks at ultra settings....struggled to maintain anything near 100fps. I actually dropped tp 40 a few times. I knew i should have gone with a threadripper.
